Terms of Service

Last Updated: December 01, 2025

1. About RekaDish

RekaDish (“we,” “our,” “us”) operates as an online recipe and food-content platform under the name “RekaDish,” without a formal company entity. These Terms of Service are governed by the laws of New Jersey, USA.

2. Eligibility

Anyone may view RekaDish. To create an account, save favorites, leave ratings, or submit future content, you must be at least 13 years old in accordance with U.S. online service guidelines.

3. User Accounts

If you create an account on RekaDish, you agree to provide accurate information. You are responsible for safeguarding your login credentials. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized access. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms or pose security concerns.

4. Ownership of Content

All recipes, images, photos, text, instructions, videos, designs, and all other content on RekaDish are owned exclusively by RekaDish unless otherwise stated.

Users are encouraged to share public recipe links on social media platforms. Social previews—including images—may appear automatically when sharing links.

Users may not:

  • Scrape or extract data from the website
  • Copy recipes or photos and republish them elsewhere
  • Use our content for commercial purposes without written permission
  • Bulk download, distribute, or mirror any content

5. User-Submitted Content

In the future, users may submit ratings, comments, or recipe-related content. By submitting any content, you grant RekaDish a non-exclusive, royalty-free, perpetual, worldwide license to use, modify, display, promote, and distribute your content as part of the platform.

You represent that your submissions are original, lawful, and do not infringe on the intellectual property rights of others. RekaDishreserves the right to remove or moderate any submitted content.

6. Disclaimer: Allergies, Nutrition, and Recipe Outcomes

RekaDish provides recipes for informational and entertainment purposes only. We do not guarantee nutritional accuracy, allergen safety, ingredient accuracy, or recipe results. Cooking results can vary widely due to equipment, ingredient variations, experience levels, and preparation differences.

You are fully responsible for checking ingredients for allergens, reviewing compatibility with dietary restrictions, and ensuring personal safety when cooking.

RekaDish is not liable for:

  • Food allergies or reactions
  • Cooking accidents, injuries, or illness
  • Property damage during food preparation
  • Inconsistent or unexpected recipe outcomes

7. Updates to Recipes and Content

RekaDish may update or modify recipes, instructions, images, or other content at any time to improve clarity, accuracy, or user experience.

8. Prohibited Conduct

You agree not to:

  • Scrape, harvest, or extract site data
  • Copy or republish RekaDish content elsewhere
  • Bypass security measures
  • Use automated bots (other than search engine indexing)
  • Upload harmful, offensive, or unlawful content

Sharing links to RekaDish recipes is allowed and encouraged as part of normal, acceptable use.

9. Advertising, Sponsors, and Affiliate Links

RekaDish displays advertising and may include sponsored content, brand partnerships, and affiliate links. When affiliate links are used,RekaDish may earn a commission at no additional cost to the user. Sponsored posts will be clearly disclosed.

10. Third-Party Services

RekaDish uses third-party tools and services including:

  • Supabase (database & authentication)
  • Google Ads
  • Google Analytics

We are not responsible for the actions, availability, or policies of these third-party providers.

11. Termination

We may suspend or terminate your account or access to RekaDish if you violate these Terms or if such action is required to protect the website, users, or compliance obligations. You may delete your account at any time.

12. Limitation of Liability

To the fullest extent allowed by law, RekaDish is not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages related to your use of the website, cooking outcomes, or reliance on recipe content. Use of the platform is at your own risk.

13. Changes to These Terms

We may update these Terms periodically. Continued use of RekaDishafter updates signifies acceptance of the revised Terms.

14. Contact

For questions regarding these Terms, please contact us at:
[support@rekadish.com]
